'''A Note Left by Someone''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Gendou Ringo's Strange Fortune Slips]]''.

==Text==
The Thieves' Final Destination<br>
Investigate the strange occurrences at the marked location.

Send in the Shuumatsu to end traitors and criminals alike.
